Translations.Text: Zai zhe “gulanjing” li, wo que yi wei zhongren chanshule gezhong biyu, ren shi zhengbian zuiduo de.

Dang zhengdao lailin zhongren de shihou, tamen bu xindao, ye bu xiang tamen de zhu qiurao, na zhishi yinwei tamen yao dengdai (zhenzhu jiang) guren de changdao xianxian yu tamen, huo yanjian xingfa lailin tamen.
Wo zhi paiqian shizhemen baoxi xin chuan jinggao, er bu xindao de renmen que yi wangyan xiang zhengbian, yu jie ci fanbo zhenli. Tamen ba wo de jixiang he dui tamen de jinggao, dangzuo xiaobing.

Youren yi zhu de jixiang jiaohui tamen, dan tamen biqi ta, bingqie wangji tamen yiqian suo fan de zui'e; you shui bi tamen hai buyi ne? Wo que yi jiang bomo jia zai tamen de xin shang, yimian tamen liaojie jing yi, bingqie zai tamen de er li zao zhong ting. Ruguo ni zhao tamen yu zhengdao, namo, tamen jiang yong bu zunxun zhengdao.

Ni de zhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de. Jiaruo ta wei tamen suo fan de zui'e er chengzhi tamen, namo, ta bi wei tamen er cujin xingfa de lailin, dan tamen you ge dingqi, tamen dui nage dingqi, jue buneng huode yige binan suo.
Naxie shi zhen de jumin duo xing buyi de shihou, wo huimie tamen, wo wei tamen de huimie er yuding yige qixian.
